titles.title: Timber Revitalization and Economic Enhancement Act of 2017
Timber Revitalization and Economic Enhancement Act of 2017
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent certain provisions of the Heartland, Habitat, Harvest, and Horticulture Act of 2008 relating to timber.
Timber Revitalization and Economic Enhancement Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Timber Revitalization and Economic Enhancement Act of 2017
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the reduced tax rate for corporations that have both net capital gains and timber gains.
